properties.name: spring.schedule.cron.datasource.driven.main-task-unique-id
properties.description: The ID of the main task.

properties.name: spring.schedule.cron.datasource.driven.main-task-express
properties.description: When there is no main task information in the data source task information, you can configure the cron expression information of the main task by yourself.

properties.name: spring.schedule.cron.datasource.driven.yml-config-name
properties.description: The name that needs to be configured after selecting DataSource.YAML_CONFIG as the data source.

properties.name: spring.schedule.cron.datasource.driven.logger-name
properties.description: The log name of the configuration..

properties.name: spring.schedule.cron.web.request.authentication.enable
properties.description: Whether to enable authentication of exposed interfaces.
